name: Top Secret Slaughterhouse
description:
Get ready for some intense retro arcade action with Top Secret Slaughterhouse! Step into the role of a lone survivor standing against the hordes of robots, mutants, aliens and even former employees of this top secret facility in a pixel art bullet fest.

This game is currently in an early beta state and still under heavy development. Not all of the features described to in the game's "How to Play" section are implemented yet. As development continues, more information about game play will be provided here.
